name: vcsbzr.vim
description:
This is a plugin for VCSCommand (vimscript #90) that integrates the Bazaar version control system (http://bazaar-vcs.org).  It allows the basic version control commands of VCSCommand to be applied to projects versioned using Bazaar.

This script is maintained at http://launchpad.net/bzr-vim
install_details: After installing VCSCommand (vimscript #90), copy the vcsbzr.vim file to the directory where vcscommmand.vim is located.
